common.keywords: developer, web developer, web designer, web development, web design, portfolio, Jiří Poledník, Jiří, Poledník, Jiří Poledník Portfolio, Jiří Poledník Web Developer, Jiří Poledník Web Designer, Jiří Poledník Web Development, Jiří Poledník Web Design

Anewgo.title: Anewgo - Frontend Developer

description.one: At Anewgo, my role as a Frontend Developer involved crafting an engaging interface for an online platform aimed at simplifying real estate transactions. This platform serves as a key tool for U.S. homeowners and real estate professionals.
description.two: I utilized React.js to build dynamic user interfaces, ensuring that the platform was both intuitive and efficient for users. My contributions were critical in facilitating smooth and secure property listings and transactions.
description.three: The technologies I employed included advanced frameworks and tools such as React Query and JavaScript, which helped in optimizing data handling and UI responsiveness.

Anewgo.technologies: React.js, React Query, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Git, Jira, Confluence

Ondrasek.title: Ondrášek - Fullstack Developer

description.one: During my tenure with Ondrášek, I developed a robust content management system (CMS) for managing digital content related to printing machine spare parts.
description.two: The project not only enhanced the operational capabilities of the CMS but also laid the groundwork for the initial development phase of an e-commerce platform tailored for the business's unique needs.
description.three: My work involved using modern web technologies such as NextJS and TypeScript, enhancing site manageability and scalability.

Ondrasek.technologies: React, TypeScript, JavaScript, GraphQL, NextJS, HTML, CSS, Git

eMetsa.title: eMetsa - Frontend Developer

description.one: As part of the eMetsa project, I focused on transforming forest management in Finland by developing a user-friendly digital interface.
description.two: My contributions included the integration of financial planning tools and real-time analytics, which significantly aided forest owners in making informed decisions about their properties.
description.three: This role utilized my skills in React and TypeScript, along with my knowledge of Node.js and Azure DevOps, to create a seamless user experience across various digital platforms.

eMetsa.technologies: React, TypeScript, JavaScript, Node.js, Azure DevOps, HTML, CSS, Git

PackDesigner.title: PackDesigner - Full Stack Developer

description.one: In my role as Full Stack Developer for PackDesigner, I spearheaded the development of a new packaging design application, blending innovative design with technical functionality.
description.two: I leveraged technologies such as ThreeJS and React Fibre to create detailed and interactive 3D visualizations of packaging designs, enabling users to visualize changes in real-time.
description.three: The backend was powered by Node.JS with Azure serverless functions, which I managed to ensure high performance and scalability.

PackDesigner.technologies: React, TypeScript, JavaScript, React Fibre, ThreeJS, Drei, Node.JS, Azure DevOps, HTML, CSS, Git
